mean_cn: adj. （昆虫）完全社会性的，完全群居的
mean_en: Of or pertaining to certain social animals' societies (such as those of ants) in which sterile individuals work for reproductive individuals
word_etyma: eu好 + social社会的 → eusocial 完全社会性的
sentence: Ants are eusocial because the worker ants serve their queen ant.
sentence_trans: 蚂蚁是一类完全社会性群体，因为工蚁为蚁后服务。
